text:
#DYK that 14 billion #COVID19 vaccines are needed globally, but current global manufacturing capacity is only 3-5 billion? 💉

In response to COVID and future pandemics, Africa must strengthen & upscale its #vaccine manufacturing capacity. 

Learn more 👇🏾
